description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Bowral, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Idyllic Southern Highlands Heritage Retreat with Private Golf Course & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the majestic charms of the Southern Highlands with a luxe stay at this grandly refurbished heritage retreat in scenic Bowral. Bask in the old-world elegance of this tranquil retreat, surrounded by a nine-hole golf course and manicured gardens and easily reachable from Sydney, Canberra and the South Coast. Feast on local produce and a seasonally rotating menu at the onsite Hickory's Restaurant and Bar, or hop in the car to visit the region's renowned cool-climate wineries, only a short drive away.

hotels.vendor_name: Milton Park Country House Hotel & Spa
hotels.title: NSW Southern Highlands Country Estate Luxury with Signature Dining & Renowned Gardens
hotels.description: Discover a boutique retreat in the Southern Highlands just two hours from Sydney. With French Provencal elegance and 44 luxurious rooms overlooking stunning gardens or pine forests, this hotel offers a truly romantic escape. Enjoy high tea on The Terrace, cocktails at The Polo Bar, or fine dining at Hordens Restaurant. Explore the only English School of Landscape garden outside Europe, then unwind in your sumptuous, delicately designed room, all within the serene beauty of this exceptional estate.

seo.title: Hôtels à Bowral - Australie Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Bowral, Australia avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
